title: 14 day ban
body:
Hi, I wanted to know if it was normal to get 2 week ban before a chat ban because I got a 2 week ban a couple days ago without any chat ban before it.
Also rip me because I'm honor 4 and the honor rewards are November 1 and I just got banned.. dishonored ?

replies.body:
Depends what the punishment was for. If the punishment was for behaviour unrelated to chat (like intent feeding) then you'll jump straight to a 14 day. It doesn't make sense to chat ban for a non chat offence.

If you were banned for chat then likely it was something severe like hate speech as such things will see you escalated through punishment tiers.

My ban was hate speech?

Fuck this is news to me.

I did say likely. You're saying you never received a chat restriction before? Because for you I would find it strange to jump straight to 14 day, but I can also see you getting a chat restriction some long time ago and not remaining neutral enough to drop the punishment tier over time.

No i had NEVER received a punishment, that's my point.

But keep proving you don't even know how the system you defend works.

I was asking a question with the intent of helping you work out why you received the punishment you did, because if it was in error then you know maybe we could do something about that. I'm trying my best to be polite here...

It sounds like it was probably a manual ban, did you get logs with it? I don't believe you get logs if it's a manual ban (you have to contact support for them).
It's ridiculous to be honest. I don't get why they just don't chat restrict them

Only manual bans result in premature escalations.

Basically the bot for banning didn't ban you, an actual person did. (almost like the system doesn't work)
